name: Lever Action Rifle
basicEffect: Target a creature up to 20m away. You deal 40 damage to the target.
tier1Effect: Target a creature up to 20m away. Draw two Chance Cards, you deal 76 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier1Apt4Change: Draw 3 Chance Cards and choose 2 to play.
tier1Apt4FullText: Target a creature up to 20m away. Draw 3 Chance Cards and choose 2 to play. You deal 76 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier1Apt8Change: You can Discard a card as part of this attack to Ignore the penalty for blind firing through walls.
tier1Apt8FullText: Target a creature up to 20m away. Draw two Chance Cards, you deal 76 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand. You can Discard a card as part of this attack to Ignore the penalty for blind firing through walls.
tier2Effect: Target a creature up to 30m away. Draw a Chance Card, you deal 200 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier2Apt4Change: Draw 2 Chance Cards and choose 1 to play.
tier2Apt4FullText: Target a creature up to 30m away. Draw 2 Chance Cards and choose 1 to play. You deal 200 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier2Apt8Change: You can Discard a card as part of this attack to Ignore the penalty for blind firing through walls.
tier2Apt8FullText: Target a creature up to 30m away. Draw a Chance Card, you deal 200 damage to the target on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand. You can Discard a card as part of this attack to Ignore the penalty for blind firing through walls.

name: Stagecoach Shotgun
basicEffect: Target a creature up to 20m away. You deal 40 damage to the target.
tier1Effect: You create a 1x1 Cone. You deal each creature in the Zone 90 damage.
tier1Apt4FullText: You create a 1x1 Cone. You deal each **Enemy** in the Zone 90 damage.
tier1Apt8FullText: You create a 2x2 Cone. You deal each creature in the Zone 90 damage.
tier2Effect: You create a 3x3 Cone. You deal each creature in the Zone 76 damage and Push them 3m.
tier2Apt4FullText: You create a 3x3 Cone. You deal each **Enemy** in the Zone 76 damage and Push them 3m.
tier2Apt8Change: You also knock the targets Prone.
tier2Apt8FullText: You create a 3x3 Cone. You deal each creature in the Zone 76 damage, Push them 3m, and knock them Prone.

name: Pulse Pistol
tier1Effect: Designate a target within 10m. Draw 3 Chance Cards, deal the target 30 damage for each Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier1Apt4Change: If you are granted a Basic Attack while wielding this weapon, you can use this weapon’s Tier 1 attack instead.
tier1Apt4FullText:
Designate a target within 10m. Draw 3 Chance Cards, deal the target 30 damage for each Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.

Additionally, if you are granted a Basic Attack while wielding this weapon, you can use this weapon’s Tier 1 attack instead.
tier1Apt8Change: When you use a Tier 2 Attack to activate this Action, you activate it twice, including any secondary effects from the Talents, Feats, etc.
tier1Apt8FullText:
Designate a target within 10m. Draw 3 Chance Cards, deal the target 30 damage for each Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.

Additionally, when you use a Tier 2 Attack to activate this Action, you activate it twice, including any secondary effects from the Talents, Feats, etc.

name: Scrap Gun
basicEffect: Target a creature up to 10m away. Draw a Chance Card, you deal 50 damage on a Hit. Discard the Chance Card.
tier1Effect:
Target a creature and deal damage as follows:
- Target is up to 3m away, you deal 200 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 4-7m away, you deal 150 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 8-10m away, you deal 100 damage on a Hit.
Draw a Chance Card and add it to your hand.
tier1Apt4Change: On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier1Apt4FullText:
Target a creature and deal damage as follows:
- Target is up to 3m away, you deal 200 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 4-7m away, you deal 150 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 8-10m away, you deal 100 damage on a Hit.
Draw a Chance Card and add it to your hand.

On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier1Apt8Change: On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier1Apt8FullText:
Target a creature and deal damage as follows:
- Target is up to 3m away, you deal 200 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 4-7m away, you deal 150 damage on a Hit.
- Target is 8-10m away, you deal 100 damage on a Hit.
Draw a Chance Card and add it to your hand.

On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier2Effect: Designate a 3x3 Blast Zone within 10m. Draw a Chance Card for each creature in the Zone. You deal 125 damage on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.
tier2Apt4Change: Draw 1 Chance Card before you draw the Chance Cards for each Target. You can swap this Chance Card for any of the others.
tier2Apt4FullText:
Designate a 3x3 Blast Zone within 10m. Draw a Chance Card for each creature in the Zone. You deal 125 damage on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.

Before drawing Chance Cards for each target, draw 1 additional Chance Card. You may swap this Chance Card for any of the others.
tier2Apt8Change: On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier2Apt8FullText:
Designate a 3x3 Blast Zone within 10m. Draw a Chance Card for each creature in the Zone. You deal 125 damage on a Hit. Add one Chance Card to your hand.

On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.

name: Chain Hook
tier1Effect: You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.
tier1Apt4FullText: You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.
tier1Apt8FullText: You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.
tier2Effect: You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Then you immediately make an Unarmed Basic Attack. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.
tier2Apt4Change: Draw 1 Chance Card before you draw the Chance Cards for each Target. You can swap this Chance Card for any of the others.
tier2Apt4FullText:
You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Then you immediately make an Unarmed Basic Attack. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.

Before drawing Chance Cards for each target, draw 1 additional Chance Card. You may swap this Chance Card for any of the others.
tier2Apt8Change: On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.
tier2Apt8FullText:
You target a creature up to 10m away. You deal the target 5 damage and you Pull the Target to a square adjacent to you. Then you immediately make an Unarmed Basic Attack. Special: You can target a creature up to 20m away, but you must draw a Chance Card to determine the result. Note: Creatures 1 size larger than you are Pulled ½ the normal distance. Creatures more than 1 size larger than are not Pulled.

On a Miss, you deal ½ damage.

name: Basic Attack
basicEffect: Deal 40 damage to a target within 1m.  Special: You can use this Attack Action without playing a card (even if your hand is full of Chance Cards).
